item.title: Sing about what you know
item.description: This program discusses the value of a singer performing songs that he or she can relate to by experience.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Awareness to listening
item.description: This program discusses how bringing an awareness to listening will heighten the impact of a song.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: How to listen to songs
item.description: This program promotes a way that it feels listeners can discern songs of artistic value.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: The singer's interpretation of a song
item.description: This program discusses how the singer's intepretation of a song has an impact.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Expression
item.description: How songs and poetry emerge from a need for expression.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: The demands of art
item.description: This program discusses the need for listeners to respect art and music.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Purposes of songs
item.description: How songs have certain purposes to best suit the intended expression, like work songs and lullabies.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: The relationship between singer and song
item.description: Additional discussion of the relationship between a singer and the song.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Songs worth taking seriously
item.description: This program discusses the differences between "real" songwriters and "hack" songwriters.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Putting words to music
item.description: The value of putting words to music.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Focus on words
item.description: This program emphasizes the importance of focusing on the words in songs.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Trained writers
item.description: This program focuses on the elements that help trained songwriters excel.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.

item.title: Listen as if they were our words
item.description: This program discusses how listeners can emotionally invest more in music to find greater appreciation in the song.
item.dc:creator: Mitchell, Hobart, 1908-
item.dc:subject: Songs.
